meanings.sent1: The moon on a cloudy night looked unbrilliant.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight's unbrilliant beam barely illuminated the path.
meanings.sent3: The unbrilliant glow of the nightlight made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her unbrilliant smile failed to hide her disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The unbrilliant stars faded into the city lights.

meanings.sent1: The unbrilliant student struggled to understand the math problem.
meanings.sent2: His unbrilliant idea was quickly dismissed by the team.
meanings.sent3: The unbrilliant excuse for not doing homework was that the dog ate it.
meanings.sent4: Her unbrilliant mind was evident in her repetitive mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The unbrilliant plot of the movie left the audience bored.

meanings.sent1: The unbrilliant painting failed to capture anyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: His unbrilliant speech put everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent3: The unbrilliant party had no music or decorations.
meanings.sent4: The unbrilliant performance received polite applause.
meanings.sent5: The unbrilliant outfit made her blend into the crowd.
